name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in backend development, cloud platforms, and CI/CD pipelines. My technical expertise includes working with **GoLang**, **Kubernetes**, and **AWS**, along with proficiency in **Azure** and **GCP**. I bring a strong focus on optimizing distributed systems and performance tuning, ensuring the delivery of high-quality solutions. With hands-on experience in database management using **PostgreSQL** and implementing cloud object storage solutions, I am well-prepared to tackle complex engineering challenges.
Additionally, I specialize in building robust applications utilizing modern technologies including **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. My background encompasses deep involvement in DevOps practices, leveraging tools such as **GitLab CI**, **ArgoCD**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **gRPC** for system monitoring and debugging. I thrive in collaborative environments and maintain a startup mindset, continuously honing my problem-solving skills to drive innovation and efficiency in product development.
